CustomField.description: ... this checkbox manages the behavior of the B2C Client ID certValidation trigger; when enabled -- it verifies that the JWT Certificate name maps to an existing Salesforce certificate.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... this checkbox manages the behavior of the B2C Client ID certValidation trigger; when enabled -- it verifies that the JWT Certificate name maps to an existing Salesforce certificate.
CustomField.label: Enable Client ID CertValidation Trigger
